name: B-Daman
summary:
Immerse yourself in the dynamic and thrilling universe of B-Daman Crossfire, your destination for intense marble-blasting combat. This game places you in the midst of the action where skill in maneuvering and strategy will determine your success on the journey to becoming the ultimate champion.

In the world of marble shooters, you are introduced to an expansive selection of 12 distinct figures, each with unique capabilities. The game offers an exceptional degree of personalization, allowing you to customize your figure down to the finest detail. Choose from an impressive array of over 40 different parts, accessories, and colors to enhance its performance and create a hero that truly reflects your personal style.
